title: Will Islam collapse with technology development within 100 years? - Quora

He sent water down from the sky and thereby We brought forth pairs of plants, each separate from the other. Eat! Pasture your cattle! Verily in this are Signs for people endued with intelligence.” 2- clearly you have a vague idea about ISLAM because if you know the basic teaching of it you wouldn’t ask this question.One of the big teaching in quran(the holy book) itself is that you shouldn’t belive blindly but rather look for reasonable reasons to do so by looking at nature and in yourself your creation. 3-for an excellent understanding of islam I recommand that you read the quran with an open mind and open heart and challenge tha claims that are made in the quran and see if the are reasonable or not as the quran itself gives you a falsification test in (Surah An-Nisa, 4:82): "Do they not consider the Quran? Had it been from any other than Allah, they would surely have found therein much discrepancy."

No. Voltaire once said he thought the Bible would be a relic in 200 years. That’s why every motel nightstand has a copy of the complete works of Voltaire. When my Reserve unit was training for the Gulf War, we were briefed by a State Department Middle East specialist who told how, early in his career, he expressed an interest in learning about Islam. “Forget Islam,” a “mentor” told him, “Marxism is going to dominate their thinking in the 21st century!” Umm, yeah. How did that work out? By the end of the year, the Soviet Union would dissolve. Predictions of the imminent demise of religion have been made so often that we are entitled to chuck the whole concept in the dustbin of history. What really needs to decline, and may very well as those societies become more affluent, is the toxic, machismo culture that is obsessed with personal and family status and the subjugation of women. Islam will be around for a while. So will Christianity, Buddhism, Hinduism, and all the rest.
